values: this is no longer ashley speaking so back off!

dear ____,
i miss you. please come back into my life.
i love you.

Your full name:: Ashley Lynn Mahoney Age:: 15 Height:: 5'2 Natural hair colour:: black Eye colour:: brown Number of siblings:: deux [two] Glasses/contacts?:: neither. Piercings:: ears Tattoos:: not yet Braces?:: never again.... "my favorites" Colour:: black&purple, purple&turquoise Band:: ugh...i hate this question. i love so many bands. but i suppose thursday is my most-listened to. Song:: i've been partial to '44 calibur love letter' alexisonfire Stuffed animal:: snowman . and pink hippo. Video game:: grand theft auto...vice city TV show:: Degrassi Movie:: i love a lot of movies. The Pianist I have recently seen, and I love it. Jakob the Liar is also great. The Virgin Suicides. Book:: The Outsiders. Food:: i could never pick out of all of the great foods out there. Game on a cell phone:: er....i dont have one. CD cover:: um...i don't know, really. Flower:: white rose. Scent:: my perfume...and the CK for guys stuff. Animal:: newborn puppies. [emfo] Comic book:: the adventures of cleft! the boy chin wonder Cereal:: POPS or apple jacks Website:: livejournal, homestarrunner Cartoon:: arthur "do i" Play an instrument?:: used to play the flute. Watch TV more than 60 hours a week?:: nooo. i barely watch it at all. Like to sing?:: constantly. that's all i ever do. Have a job?:: yes Have a cell phone?:: yup. lost it, though. Like to play sports?:: depending on the sport. Have a boyfriend/girlfriend?:: working on it. actually, no i'm not. Have a crush on someone?:: a few. Live somewhere NOT in the united states?:: i wish. Have more than 5 TVs in your house?:: nope. four. i think.... Have any special talents/skills?:: of course. i do this weird thing with my nose. skillful. Excercise daily?:: not really. Like school?:: never. "have i ever" Snuck out of the house?:: no.? i have nowhere to go. i live in charlton for gods sake. Cried to get out of trouble?:: nope. Gotten lost in your city?:: i don't live in a city. i live in a cow field. Seen a shooting star?:: maybe once. beautiful. Been to any other countries besides the united states?:: nope. But europe this april....can't wait. Had a serious surgery?:: no...*knock on wood* Stolen something important to someone else?:: probably when i was a kid. i was am evil. Solved a rubiks cube?:: only when i re-arrange the stickers. Gone out in public in your pajamas?:: many times. Cried over a girl?:: probably a loss of a friend. Cried over a boy?:: yes. Kissed a random stranger?:: i wouldn't doubt it. Hugged a random stranger?:: tons of times. Been in a fist fight?:: only with michele. and i punched some girl for calling michele ugly. and...i'm just very violent. Been arrested?:: nope. Done drugs?:: no Had alcohol?:: yes Laughed and had milk come out of your nose?:: not milk, but koolaid Pushed all the buttons on an elevator?:: yes...! i've done everything in an elevator.... Gone to school only to find you had the day off because of a holiday/etc?:: nope. but i remember one time, there was a blizzard out, and there wasn't school. i looked out the window, and my neighbor was standing in the freezing cold waiting for the bus. and i didn't tell her that school was cancelled. Swore at your parents?:: yes. but a long time ago. i find it better to just be calm with them. Been to warped tour?:: no..this year hopefully. Kicked a guy where it hurts?:: yeah. my nickname used to be "balls buster" or.."the nutcracker". Been in love?:: never. Been close to love?:: never. Been to a casino?:: nope Ran over an animal and killed it?:: no..but dave did yesterday. Broken a bone?:: no...i almost did the other night at mattus house. *knocks on wood* Gotten stitches?:: nah. Had a waterballoon fight in winter?:: good idea.... Drank a whole gallon of milk in one hour?:: o can barely drink a full glass in one hour. Made homemade muffins?:: yes Bitten someone?:: when i was a baby. i bit my sister. Been to disneyland/disneyworld?:: disneyland More than 5 times?:: nope. Been to niagra falls?:: yes Burped in someones face?:: ew. probably, though. Gotten the chicken pox?:: yes of course "my friends" How many friends do you have?:: enough What are their names?:: you want me to name all of them? Do you have a best friend?:: yes. Have you ever liked one of your friends?:: yes. Do you have more guy friends or more girl friends?:: guy friends. actually, it may be even. Have you ever lost a friend?:: not due to death. but i have lost friends. Have you ever gone to an amusement park with a friend?:: plenty of times Whats an inside joke between you and a friend?:: i wish you were a skeleton. Have you ever gotten in a big arguement with a friend?:: yes. Whats the nicest thing youve ever done for a friend?:: ask them. Whats the nicest thing a friend has ever done for you?:: been my friend. Do you miss any of your old friends?:: athena. What friend have you known the longest?:: jaxie Do you regret anything youve done to a friend?:: yes. many things. If so, what is it?:: many things. How often do you spend time with your friends?:: a lot. Do any of your friends drive?:: yes. C*J, Jocelyn, Dave, Paul [although his car is completely dead], and probably others. Has a friend of yours ever died?:: i don't think so. Whats the dumbest thing youve done with a friend?:: basically everything that i have done with my friends. What do you think your friends think of you?:: i'm fun. "do i think i am" funny?:: yes, but i'm usually the only one laughing at my jokes. pretty?:: i'm told this constantly. today i feel pretty. but not usually. sarcastic?:: oh yeah. lazy?:: the laziest. hyper?:: not as much as i used to be. friendly?:: not as much as i used to be. evil?:: yes. smart?:: yes. but my grades don't show it, due to my laziness. strong?:: can be. talented?:: at some things. dorky?:: yes. "would i ever? " Sky dive?:: DEFINITELY. Play strip poker?:: probably. Run away?:: if i had somewhere to run away to, than maybe. depends on the circumstances. Curse at a teacher?:: er...i've done it before. not good. but it was probably just miss lirange, so it doesn't matter. i didn't curse at her, persay. just at the situation. Not take a shower for a week?:: probably. Ask someone out?:: no. i don't do that anymore. Lie to someone to make them think better of you?:: no way...thats sick. Visit a foreign country for more than a month?:: yes! of course. with no looking back. Go scuba diving?:: most definitely. Write a book?:: yes. i've started to a million times before. and i'm currently writing one. Become a rockstar?:: i aspire to. Have casual sex?:: not for me. "last part" What shampoo do you use?:: finesse What kind of computer do you have?:: dell Whatt grade are you in right now:: i'm going to be a junior Do you like to throw popcorn at people in the movies?:: gummi bears? How many posters do you have in your room?:: four, i think. and then there's pictures. and a napkin. How many cds do you have?:: millions. well, not millions. but a lot. What time is it now?:: 7:21

I HAVE A NEW LJ USERNAME.

it is:

error___error_

so...add me to your friends list. and i will add you back. comment and whatnot. i'll probably be using that one from now on. 

<3

I was waiting for a cross-town train in the london underground, when it struck me. I've been waiting since birth to find a love that would look and sound like a movie. So i changed my plans, rented a camera and a van. Then I called you. "I need you to pretend that we are in love again." And you agreed to. I want so badly to believe that there is truth, that love is real. and i want life in every word, to the extent that it's absurd. I greased the lense and framed the shot, using a friend as my stand-in. The script it called for rain, but it was clear that day. so we faked it. the marker snapped, and i yelled, "quiet on the set!" and then called, "ACTION!" I kissed you in a style Clark Gable would have admired. I thought it classic. I know you're wise beyond your years, but do you ever get the fear...that your perfect verse is just a lie you tell yourself to help you get by?

my hair looks longer than it really is in that picture. whats up with that?

 

that was a fun time.

Ok. This is probably going to be a long update. so if you don't care about me or my life, then you probably won't want to read it.

well...i can't remember which days I did what. 

All I know is that:

Michele and I went over Brits house. We went to the movies and saw The Stepford Wives. It was a strange movie...I don't know what i think of it. But Matthew Broderick was in it, which was the best part. Then, we went home and slept. We woke up the next morning and went to 'practice'. i went home after that.

Later, i went to mattus house. the people there were:
jimi b, emfo, joey, nia, rhiannon, mattu [obviously, seeing as how it was his abode], danielle, steve, mike[?],david[?]. and...i think that's it. i practically broke my foot. i 'fell' off the trampoline. i slept over emfos that night.

the next day, sir dave farrar and paul came to pick us up. we went to the movie theatre, because paul had previously left his hat there. no luck finding it. then, we drove around in circles for an hour trying to find the chinese buffet. so we just decided to go to "panda express" at the greendale mall. complete ripoff. there were no pandas. then, we went back to Pauls house...where his vicious dog kept harassing me. We watched a movie which was kind of dumb...but still funny. Emfo and I 'lulled' Dave to sleep by caressing his head. They dropped us off...and I went home soonafter.

I slept over Micheles. This morning we went to the Salvation Army in Whitinsville for many hours.
I came back to micheles, and slept on her couch for 45 minutes. Went to work from 4-7.

Then I came back to Emfos. I was the first to arrive. Mattu came soonafter. And I styled his hair. He was wearing Emfos moms pants. And he looked hot. I'm going to post pictures later. Then we sat in the tub and talked to Danielle on the phone. I watched part of Aladdin.
We went outside and were dancing in the dark at the end of Emfos driveway. Dave, Paul, Jimi B, and Danielle [not mattus danielle] came. We hung around for awhile, and Paul made us coffee. I went swimming with Ryan Fournier.
[did i mention ryan fournier and ken showed up?]
Michele couldn't come. That was a drag.
But it was a good time had by all.
...dave lost his deodorant.

but yes. comment or something.

i'm at emfos hizzouse right now. mattu just showed up. he's holding a puppy and he's in love with it. it's raining...and we are all happy, because we enjoy the rain. 

jimi b, dave farrar, and paul are coming in an hour. i think steve is coming too.



i'm going to update again later!

daniel just popped in the window and said, "THAT WAS AWESOME".

he's hot when he's wet.

i finally have a bathing suit

leave some great comments
there is a serious matter of life or death going on directly behind me. the first birth i have witnessed. i hope she still lives.

i'm going over brits. with michele. i think ellie will be there too.
i haven't seen ellie in a long time. 
mattu invited michele and i over.
I miss mattu. I'm really glad we're still best friends. after all these years. 
I hope we'll always be best friends.
forever.
like me and michele.


my little sister is doing my hair. and i realized the other day....i miss her being a really little kid. 
we had the best of times.

andrew leave me a comment 
:)

i'm gone

who wants to hang out soon.

?
all of a sudden i have taken a great liking to red-headed boys. a great liking.

da da da da da

sometimes i think i'm content with who i am.

right now i'm in a complete state of peace.

i'm gonna go outside and lay in the sun for awhile.
who wants to be my boyfriend?

dave morrow is awesome. i hope he never forgets me.
i adore that boy.

hot papa ginos boy just called.

he was on a cell phone and he kept breaking up.

this is how it went:

ashley: hello?
chris: hello...
ashley: hi..?
chris: this is chris...i met you the other night at papa ginos
ashley: oh hi...
*breaking up*
chris: hello..? hello..?
ashley: hello?? are you on a cell phone?
chris: yeah
ashley: you're breaking up wicked bad
chris: ...hello?
ashley: hi.
chris: so how old are you?
ashley: 15.
chris: uh...hello?
ashley: hello... did you hear me?
chris: no i didnt
ashley: i said i'm 15
chris: oh
ashley: and you are...?
chris: a little too old for you
ashley: 20, right?
chris: yeah. 
ashley: yeah, thats what your friend said the other night.
*breaking up*
chris: well...i guess i'll talk to you later. i *breaking up* my foot last night so *breaking up* i'm just chillin at home
ashley: .....ok..... so are you going to call me later?
chris: uh..yeah...or if not, i'll call you tomorrow.


i'm fully aware that this kid's never gonna call me again.

man that sucks.

so go fill out that thing in my last entry.

want a deeper relationship?)

im nice, im ignorant ect.)

i tried to make this picture lighter, because it was dark. so i'm kind of like....glowing or something abnormal like that. I already look terrible in this picture anyways.

i'm at Mattus house right now. No ones home. Except for Momma LaVergne. And me, and brit, and michele. I was looking through their old yearbooks.

And I saw Dane in 8th grade. 
He was so adorable.
Dane, you were so cute when you were in 8th grade.

TJ just walked in. He reminds me of Andrew Coon. I havent seen TJ in about a year or so. And he's just so...andrew coon.

that means he is hot.

Hey, Julie, where are you? Mattu said you were going to be home. I love you.

♥

wow. i fucking hate everything that exists.
everyone that breathes.

i fucking hate it when i can't talk to people.
i hate it when people are cold and distant.

i just fucking hate everything.

i hope i die soon. because i'm sick of it.

i hate boys they are so confusing. one minute they are one way and the next minute they are the other way. i'm not going to matt kings house today. i have places to go. people to kill. i cant waste my time with petty pool parties. besides, brit effing gopsill and michele 'the genius' bouchard are sleeping over. we have people to wreck.

I hung out with Duck and Emfo all night. It was so much fun.
And a hot guy at Papa Ginos asked for my number. And he hugged me.
But he was 20.
He looked 16.
I don't think he knew how old I was.

now i'm at emfos. i straightened dans hair. its longer than mine. and he was complaining because i gave him a comb-over. and it wasn't 'skater-like'. 
then i straightened emfos hair.
and she straightened mine.

her straightener is a beast. it works so good. my hair is the straightest i have ever seen it.

i'm gone.

♥

i have a headache.

i woke up at 1:00 this afternoon. I played video games with my sister. I washed my hair and went to work.

Jenn spilled a bucket full of chili all over the entire deli. it took forever to clean up. but it was hilarious.

so...i may sleep over micheles tonight. because we have 'rehearsal' tomorrow. even though i haven't memorized my lines. crap. i always procrastinate. its so bad.

i'm effing mad that i have no more apple jacks left in my house.


Duck, if you are reading this, IM me if you come online. I found out today that they changed my working hours, so now i'm working at 3 instead of 4. do you still think we could possibly do something?

I want to go to the beach soon. And...Matt[space]King...when am i coming to swim in your pool again?

And I want a boyfriend.

but i dont think he wants to anymore?

 

see ya later, kids.

so it's been decided. this whole 'war' is over. it was completely pointless and juvenile, anyways. Krysta and I have talked about it, and we both apologized to each other for everything we said/did. So...I'm glad this is over. I can rest easily now.

Sorry Krysta, for being the biggest asshole in the world. I may not agree with everything you do, or even like it at all, but it doesnt give me the right to say the things i said.

goodnight to you all.
i'm so bored. could you tell? this is about my seventh time posting today. well i don't know why i'm posting these pictures, but i am.

andrew once said that he thinks i should move to northbridge. i wish i could live in northbridge. it would be so much better than living here. actually, living anywhere else would be an improvement. because i hate it here. 

i wish my friends would stop telling me how immature i'm being. yeah, i know this already. did i ever say that i was handling the situation in a mature manner? No. I know how immature I'm being. 

brit asked me and michele if we wanted to do something with her this weekend. with analiese, too. you have no idea how much i just want to hang out with them.

and i'm supposed to do something with alex and andrew soon.
i wish we could just figure out when to do it.


whatever, i dont give a shit about anything anymore.

i'm wearing a really skimpy shirt right now.

:(

i need a lime green tanktop/wife beater to wear under it. someone give me a lime green tanktop/wife beater.

Michele and I went to Chuck E Cheese's yesterday. We went into the tubes, and there was a little boy there. He started talking to us, and led us around to all the 'cool' places, like ....'A WIND-BLOWER!'. He was such an excited boy. He was my hero, and he was so fun to hang out with. He was six. His name was Jimmy Rogers.

Ashley: whats your name?
Jimmy: *mumble* *laugh* jimmy...*laugh* rogers...*mumble/laugh*
Ashley: what is it?
Jimmy: *laugh* jimmy ROGERS, dontcha know!
Ashley: Jimmy Rogers?
Jimmy: yyy-ess! Thats my NAAAME!

i miss jimmy rogers :(
micheles dad's new favorite phrase is: "I BRING THE MOSH"
i don't feel like cleaning my room.

michele 'the genius' bouchard just re-did my entire lj. I love her.

 

thats for all of you who are just reading this entry on their friends page.

 

comment and tell me what you think.

i layed down on the bed. something smelled like mattu. it was comforting. and it made me fall into a deep sleep.

how i love the scent of mattu.

remember that time...when i cared about you?


i don't .

i dont even remember that you exist most of the time.

stop acting like i care so much about you and your drama. 
hypocrite.

oh and by the way, this isn't who you all think it's about. so before you get your panties in a bundle, remember that. 

although, it could be very closely associated.

Today was my last day as a sophomore at Shepherd Hill Regional High School. It was a completely pointless day. Everyone signed my "yearbook". 

I left on a really bad note with Jimi B. I feel bad now. I got mad because I tried to hug him in french class. But he pulled me aside and said, "you're gonna get me in trouble". As in...trouble with Lindsay. Really, though. Jimi is one of my closest friends, and I can't hug him around her? Shouldn't she understand that he has female friends...whom he hugs? Sorry Jimi if you're reading this. I should have tried to understand a little better.

I am really going to miss Joey. I really wish he was coming back next year. I got a little teary-eyed when we went our separate ways. But, I stopped because crying in public sucks.

I just carved the coolest sculpture out of my apple. I wish you could have seen it.


post a comment if you want to do something with me this summer. and tell me what you want to do with me.

i wonder what it would be like to be on ecstacy.


and to make it clear....
i would never try.


but i just wonder what it's like.

I miss stubby. I miss being with her every weekend. and going on vacation with her. and going places with her. <u>i just miss hanging out with her.</u> we never talk anymore. I haven't seen her in months. [with the exception of seeing her at the grocery store the other day]. We always had so much fun together. Her, michele and I. We would have so many good times. I just wish I could have those days back. I feel as though, even if we hang out now, it's not going to be the same. We just drifted...and it sucks. I wish things weren't this way.

i'm not going to miss anyone over the summer.

dont comment and say, "what about me?"

i'm probably going to see all of you over the summer, anyways.




I really wonder when I'm going to stop being so bitchy. I hate everything. I've been like this for awhile. And I'm constantly mad. At everything. And everyone.

but i have found that listening to certain bands calms me down.

i'm sorry to everyone who has had to put up with my bitchiness lately.

School sucked today.

I went to Matt Kings afterward, with Emfo. We went swimming. and i didn't have a bathing suit. Then we went to the store, and did other things. We ended up going to Rhiannons softball game. It was alright. It was hot, though.

Now I'm at Emfos. It's raining outside. I absolutely love rain. I was out there with them for awhile, but i dont think i'm wanted out there anymore. Matts being a bitch.

the red in my hair is fading out. i'm gonna dye it again. soon. in a couple weeks, maybe. sometime in the early summer. but i'm not telling you how i'm going to dye it. and i may do something else. but i'm not telling you that, either.

unless you ask.

Joey is wearing the Get Piggy shirt i gave him. its skin tight.
looking good joey sweet.....

my name is actually listed under more than one username's interests on lj.

add "ashley mahoney" to your interests for your lj if you love me.

and then tell me if you did it or not.

i am listening to the coolest song. it's a french song. if i'm not mistaken, its called 'Je Cours' by Kyo. but the numbers on this c.d. are all messed up. they don't correspond with the list of the songs. Anyways, It's amazing. I can't make up my mind as to whether it's something i'd normally listen to or not. His french accent makes me absolutely melt. it's so hot. So I keep listening to this song over and over again. There is also another really amazing song on this c.d. Its by Thierry Amiel. He's extremely hot, as well. That song is so calming. I love these two songs. i'm going to look up their lyrics. although i'd have some trouble translating.
